plot: A shopaholic is stuck in a love triangle between two men--one, a psychologist trying to help her and the other, a male counterpart.
title: The Shopaholics (Jui oi nui yun kau muk kong)
plot_es: A shopaholic is stuck in a love triangle between two men--one, a psychologist trying to help her and the other, a male counterpart.
original_name: Jui oi nui yun kau muk kong
plot_en: A shopaholic is stuck in a love triangle between two men--one, a psychologist trying to help her and the other, a male counterpart.
